Headline: #71 71st/South Shore Temporary Reroute near 75th/Coles
ShortDescription: 71 71st/South Shore buses temp. rerouted NB: South Shore and 71st; SB: Exchange, 76th and South Shore: due to, street blockage near 75th/Coles.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#71 71st/South Shore buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions near 75th/Coles, due to street blockage near75th/Coles.

Northbound buses will operate via South Shore and 71st including the normal route streets.

Southbound buses will operate via Exchange, 76th and South Shore.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #26 South Shore Express, #30 South Chicago Temporary Reroute at Ewing/95th
ShortDescription: 26 South Shore Express, 30 South Chicago buses are temporarily rerouted via Ewing, 95th, Avenue L, 100th and Ewing due to, street blockage near Ewing/95th.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#26 South Shore Express, #30 South Chicago buses are temporarily rerouted via Ewing, 95th, Avenue L, 100th and Ewing due to, street blockage near Ewing/95th.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Forest Park-bound Blue Line Delays
ShortDescription: Forest Park-bound Blue Line trains are running w/residual delays following earlier police activity at Logan Square. Service is resuming, allow extra time.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Forest Park-bound Blue Line trains are running with residual delays following earlier police activity at Logan Square.

Trains are moving and normal service is being restored.

Allow extra travel time.
